```{r}
library(NLMR)
library(raster)

H = 0.5
# Generate NLM
set.seed(22)
nlm22 <- nlm_mpd(102, 102, resolution = 1, roughness = 1-H, rescale = TRUE, verbose = TRUE)
nlm22 <- crop(nlm22, c(0,100,0,100))
nlm22 <- nlm22/4
plot(nlm22)

cellStats(nlm22, sum)

nlm22 <- as.matrix(nlm22)
write.table(nlm22, here("sims_nlm", "data", "nlm"), row.names = FALSE, col.names = FALSE, sep = ",")
```
```{r}
nlm <- read.csv(here("sims_nlm", "data", "nlm"), header = FALSE)
nlm <- raster(as.matrix(nlm))
plot(nlm)
```
